TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1057
TEI.2.document_title: James Ladd to Stephen F Austin, 05-30-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Ladd to Austin, Dover, N. H., May 30, 1834. Inquiring about his son. Asks information about Texas. Thinks many will emigrate from the United States. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1057

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Ladd to Austin, Dover, N. H., May 30, 1834. Inquiring about his son. Asks information about Texas. Thinks many will emigrate from the United States. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Dover, N. H.*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="05-30-1834">May 30, 1834*/date_mentioned**/p*. *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
